mainText:
I think I own 2 of everything you have invented. On some nights I can glance
 around the room in our home and see one teen on the iPhone, another couple of kids listening to their iPods while my wife is on the Mac and I'm on my fa
vorite toy, the iPad! You were a genius the world will never realize again. God bless your family and rest in peace my friend.
header: Thank u for the cool toys!
author: Scott
